settings.title: Defy aging: no longer science fiction
settings.richtext: For the first time in history, science is revealing the root causes of aging, uncovering tools that can pave the way for a longer, healthier life. Longevity is the most disruptive force in medicine – and it’s about to change the world.

settings.text: Learn more about the 12 Causes of Aging in our science

At Jung+, we're on a crusade to liberate human longevity, translating the latest scientific advancements in aging research into products and technologies that can slow aging and extend healthy lifespan.

settings.text_item: + Based on real science, ​ingredients backed by 400+ studies

settings.title: Founded in Oxford - we’ve done our homework

settings.overflow_text: The world’s first precision-targeted longevity program

settings.title: 01 MASTER FORMULA
settings.description: Your all-in-one longevity protocol targeting all 12 hallmarks of biological aging, 24 hrs a day

settings.title: 02 PERSONALIZE & UPGRADE
settings.description: Precision engineered boosters help support and amplify evidence-based longevity lifestyle practices

settings.title: 03 TEST AND TRACK
settings.description: Measure targeted biomarkers and reveal your true biological age to measure your progress. Coming this Fall!

settings.title: Your monthly longevity kit - how it works.
settings.richtext: Inspired by the world's elite clinics, Jung's Total Longevity System™ is a powerful, self-guided program that helps you set personalized longevity goals, and pairs them with targeted longevity molecules, coaching, and research that supports your journey and amplifies your efforts.

settings.heading: LONGEVITY FOUNDATION
settings.description: Our baseline, flagship product, Longevity Foundation targets all 12 underlying causes of aging, on the smallest, subcellular level. Two, separate, AM and PM formulas create the ultimate protocol, administering the right compounds, at the right time, in the right amounts. The all-in-one formula is your first-line defense to optimize your biological age, with ingredients backed by 100+ studies.

settings.heading: FASTING TONIC™
settings.description: Fasting Tonic™ redefines fasting with a precision nutrient drink mix, making calorie restriction and fasting easier and safer. Its innovative prebiotic beadlets expand in the stomach, creating a nourishing jelly that fills you up without breaking the fast. This advanced formula replenishes vital micronutrients, feeds essential gut bacteria, alleviates fatigue, and protects against muscle loss, ensuring a more effective and comfortable fasting experience.

settings.heading: GLUCOSE BLOCKER
settings.description: Glucose Blocker tackles a major aging accelerator: excessive sugar and carbohydrate intake. This innovative formula helps support healthier post-meal glucose levels, providing steady energy and managing harmful glucose spikes Infused with Berberine, it activates pivotal longevity pathways, mitigates glycation - a key factor in wrinkle formation, and supports metabolic health for healthy weight management, making cheat meals less guilty.

settings.heading: ADVANCED SLEEP REPAIR
settings.description: Advanced Sleep Repair revolutionizes rest with its unique blend of longevity science and sleep enhancement. This meticulously crafted formula offers key building blocks for essential bodily repair and age-reversal mechanisms during sleep. By improving sleep quality and fine-tuning crucial neurotransmitter levels, it helps restore circadian balance, combats accelerated aging, fosters DNA repair, and restore metabolic health, making it a groundbreaking solution to enhance healthy longevity through sleep.

settings.heading: CELLULAR SKIN RENEWAL
settings.description: Cellular Skin Renewal transcends the limitations of topical creams or serums, standing alone as the only skin supplement leveraging the cutting-edge oflongevity science to combat every major aspect of biological skin aging, from the inside out. It revitalizes skin at the cellular level, helps clear senescent cells, replenish NAD+ levels, reactivate collagen and hyaluronic acid production, reduce wrinkles, enhance elasticity, and even skin tone.

settings.heading: TESTING & TRACKING
settings.description: Track your progress with our comprehensive longevity biomarker testing platform to help keep tabs on your longevity lifestyle.

settings.heading: LONGEVITY FOUNDATION

settings.heading: FASTING TONIC™
settings.description: Our Fasting Tonic™ doesn't stop at curbing hunger; it goes a step further by replenishing essential micronutrients and electrolytes that get depleted during a fast, helping retain additional hydration and avoid fatigue.

settings.heading: GLUCOSE BLOCKER
settings.description: Helps keep blood sugar levels healthy after a carb and sugar-rich meals, bringing you one step closer to a blue-zone style diet. Curbs the glycation process that accelerates aging and causes wrinkles. Take a serving with your meals for 'less-guilt' pasta or cake, enjoy sustained energy without the carb crash, and help reduce sugar cravings over time.

settings.heading: ADVANCED SLEEP REPAIR
settings.description: Creates the ideal biochemical environment your body needs to carry out critical age-rejuvenating processes while you sleep. Support pretty much every cognitive and physiological process.  Wake up feeling refreshed and energized. Totally non-addictive, non-sedative formula.

settings.heading: CELLULAR SKIN RENEWAL
settings.description: Cellular Skin Renewal transcends the limitations of topical creams or serums, standing alone as the only skin supplement leveraging the cutting-edge advancements of longevity science to combat every major aspect of biological skin aging from the inside out.

settings.heading: TESTING & TRACKING
settings.description: Track your progress with our comprehensive longevity biomarker testing platform to help keep tabs on your longevity lifestyle.

settings.heading: Longevity for the billions, not just billionaires.

settings.text: Our mission is clear: make top-tier longevity care accessible for all. Inspired by elite longevity clinics, our self-guided system helps you create the perfect longevity regimen, tailored to you. By leveraging best-in-class longevity molecules and adopting our evidence-based longevity lifestyle goals, you can trust our system to genuinely impact your life and health.

settings.title_slide: We love growing older. But it’s time to reimagine aging.

settings.body_slide: This set is great and it makes me feel soft and relaxed on certain days when I want to just unwind from work or other physical activities. It has a great smell to it and the aftermath of using the body cream as an additional product to moisturize makes everything just like icing on the cake. I’m usually not a “bar” type person because it runs out so fast, but the fact that you get two cleansing bars makes the price worthwhile.
